Name: Peach Daiquiri
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of peach wedge on rim.
Review: A classic Daiquiri with fragrant peach liqueur replacing sugar.
Nutrition: One serving of Peach Daiquiri contains 211 calories
